entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
